comments.author: After_Pomegranate680
comments.body:
I don't get it!  Even when I was younger, I NEVER got it.  

Why do women think some wealthy guy is going to take care of them and their family?  Just for some p\*ssy?  

Even when I was 21 and could throw down for 8 hours a day, it made NO sense to waste 50% (or more of my money) on "ONE" girl.  If I could throw down 12 hours a day, it would start to make economic sense, but only 8 hours?  Also, +99.99% of girls can NOT and will NOT throw down for 8 hours a day...every day.

It's like a house being ‚Ç¨10 million, but you can only spend 8 hours in it a day.  How does that make sense?

Not to mention the repetition of it all.  I can't even eat chicken on my diet 3 days in a row.  Why am I going to put 50% of my wealth on something that I will get tired of in a few days, or at the most, weeks?

What are these girls thinking?  Are they thinking?

I've been confused by this my entire life, and if I ask the girls to explain themselves, they start calling me horrible names :)

Well, I said that all girls have pussies so she's not special and she was kind of shocked about my answer, still fucked her few times though.

She even complained that "you fucked me without buying me a Gucci bag" ahahahahah
